title: Bloomberg Markets: Cohen Is Said to Eye High Fee Structure
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Cohen Is Said to Eye High Fee Structure
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Peggy Collins \u0010US Investing Team Leader/Personal Finance Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News \u0010Discussing Billionaire trader Steven Cohen, who may stage a comeback to the business next year when his regulatory ban on managing client money expires, has considered charging management fees of at least 2.75 percent and may pass on certain costs to investors for the first time.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
